intro_only_event_multi_ch0352_00_taro_lo: Oh! [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Would you like to attempt my Pokémon quiz?
Bring it on!
Wow, an eager challenger! Great!
Why?

I want to know if you’re a Trainer I can go all out
against, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
So I’ll figure that out with a Pokémon quiz!
And with that, let’s get started! Question one!

Take a look at this pink cutie here! What “type” of
Pokémon is she?
Fighting

Bzzzt! Nope! Wrong answer! But the fact that she’s
sometimes mistaken for a Fighting-type Pokémon is
just one of the many cute things about her!

Although your answer was incorrect, you can have
this! To commemorate us getting to know each
other better!
Don’t worry! You’ll get another chance!
Fairy

Ding ding ding! You got it! There’s just nothing like
an adorable pink fairy, right?
Since you got it right, you can have this!

Hmm... I guess my question was a little too easy
for you, huh?
I’ll think up a new question!
Come back tomorrow, OK? Pinky swear!
Hehehe! I’ve been waiting for you!
Without further ado, here’s question two!
Granbull is popular with young women.

That’s because it makes a super reliable
bodyguard! True or false?
TRUE

Bzzzt! Nope! Wrong answer! Granbull is a quiet,
delicate, and lovable Pokémon!

Supposedly, it’s popular with women because of
the endearing contrast between its personality and
appearance!

You look disappointed,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...

That’s quite unusual for you... And that’s cute!
Here, have a consolation prize!
FALSE

Ding ding ding! Supposedly, it’s popular with
young women because of the endearing contrast
between its personality and appearance!

My Granbull is a quiet, delicate, and lovable
Pokémon! That’s what makes it so cute!

Here, take this to commemorate us sharing some
cuteness!

I’ll ask my final question tomorrow!
You better be ready!
Make sure you show up, OK?
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Are you ready?

This is the last question of my Pokémon quiz!
Here we go!
What’s the cutest thing about Granbull?
Her soft belly?
Ding ding ding! Correct!

When I take naps, I use Granbull’s belly as a
pillow! That’s how much I love it!
Her Trainer, Lacey?

Bzzzt! Nope! I’m giving you a quiz on Granbull,
not me!

But now that I think about it, I guess it IS hard to
decide what the cutest thing about Granbull is.
Anyways...

It seems you’ve learned a lot about us as a
sync pair!

And through my quizzes, I’ve learned what kind of
person you are too, [Name:PlayerNickname ].

Next time we meet, I think we can have a
battle—and both go all out!
